comments.html:
I think this is not a big problem, because IPv6 is not a widely deployed. SP and Enterprise do not want to spend money for IPv6 deployment.
There is no strong demand for IPv6 service.
IMHO
comments.name: Alexander Buchenkov

comments.html: Yes, that's unbelievable in 2010 for product from company with "IPv6 commitment".
comments.name: Martin Zidek

comments.html: There still are those who have/are deploying IPv6 and soon to be a whole lot more...  There's no excuse for Cisco on this one...
comments.name: Micah
